isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - REMOVE - Remove SUN SHADE

svcproc.title: Remove SUN SHADE

figure.caption: Figure 17. Sun Shade for 5000 i and 9000 i Series

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. RIGHT AND LEFT SIDE SUN SHADE CLEARANCE LIGHT
4. HEX HEAD FLANGED MOUNTING SCREW, 3/8-16 X 1 1/4

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 17 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove mounting hardware attaching both right and left side sun shade clearance lights (Item 1) and center sun shade clearance light (Item 2) to sun shade (Item 3).

Pull right and left side sun shade clearance lights (Item 1) and center sun shade clearance light (Item 2) out of sun shade (Item 3) (they will hang free from wiring harness) to gain access to sun shade hex head flanged mounting screws (Item 4).
Reach through clearance light openings and remove three hex head flanged mounting screws (Item 4) attaching sun shade (Item 3) to day cab roof (Item 5) or Pro Sleeper® roof (Item 6).

Pull sun shade (Item 3) away from cab roof until wiring harness connector is pulled through wiring harness hole (Item 7) in day cab roof (Item 5) or Pro Sleeper® roof (Item 6). Disconnect electrical connector (Item 8) and remove sun shade. Place sun shade on clean, dry surface to keep it from getting scratched or damaged.
